s: April 15, 2024 - CreateSpace will soon become the dedicated publishing and print on-demand platform for all BookSurge and CreateSpace authors and publishers. September 18, 2024 - On-Demand Publishing, LLC, doing business as CreateSpace, was a self-publishing service owned by Amazon. The company was founded in 2000 in South Carolina as BookSurge and was acquired by Amazon in 2005. CreateSpace published books containing any content at all, other than just placeholder text.

t: The Guide to the CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform
s: June 7, 2023 - CreateSpace is the name of the original self-publishing platform developed by Amazon for independent authors and publishers.
